success_patterns.summary: The first field in the Microsoft account creation process is the email field. The field is of type text and has the id or name attribute 'iUsernameInput'. After filling it with 'tarsagent' followed by random numbers, the value of the field is 'tarsagent123456'.

success_patterns.task: Since we are verifying the email, we need to actually create the email account first. Go back to https://signup.live.com and start fresh. Inspect the page structure, fill in the first field with the u
success_patterns.summary: The available fields to fill in are email address, password, first name, last name, country/region, and birthdate.

success_patterns.task: Fill the email field with 'tarsagent' followed by random numbers, fill the password field with a strong random password, fill the first name and last name fields with random names, select a country/re
success_patterns.summary: To create a new Microsoft account, go to signup.live.com. The page will prompt you to enter your email address. You can either create a new email address or use an existing one. After entering your email address, click "Next" to proceed with the account creation process.

success_patterns.task: Log in to the newly created email account tarsmacbot2026@outlook.com and confirm that the test email was sent successfully to tarsitgroup@outlook.com
success_patterns.summary: The test email was sent successfully to tarsitgroup@outlook.com from tarsmacbot2026@outlook.com.
